titleStmt.title: A commission for the well gouerning of our people, inhabiting in New-found-land; or, traffiquing in bayes, creekes, or fresh riuers there
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: Westminster, the tenth day of February, in the ninth [y]eere of our reigne. Willys.
The year date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-C⁴.
Identified as STC 9255 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and
